BBK01.SU0045: Lending rates of banks / Mortgage loans secured by residential real estate with interest rates fixed for 5 years, effective interest rate / Highest rate of spread

General: Since January 1991 the rates of banks in the new Länder have been included in the interest rate survey. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
